APP_KEY.description: Enter your Yotpo app key. More details on finding this are here: https://support.yotpo.com/en/article/finding-your-yotpo-app-key-and-api-secret

SECRET_KEY.description: Enter your Yotpo secret key. More details on finding this are here: https://support.yotpo.com/en/article/finding-your-yotpo-app-key-and-api-secret
